BasicAttackTigerSevenFormsFlamingClaw.name: Basic Attack: Tiger Seven Forms - Flaming Claw

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> to activate:
desc.1: Slash forward up to four times, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct> and <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>.
desc.2: During the 3rd hit, repeatedly press <IconNormal /> to maintain the combo and keep striking the enemy.
desc.3: During the 3rd hit, hold or pause before pressing <IconNormal /> to chain into the 4th hit.
desc.4: During the 3rd hit, Anti-Interrupt Level is increased, and DMG received is reduced by 40%.

desc.0: During combat, Hu Wei will automatically attack enemies, dealing <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>.
desc.1: Upon hitting an enemy, gain 20 points of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Might</ct>, triggering up to once per use of a skill. The maximum for <ct color=#FFFFFF>Might</ct> is 200.

desc.0: Press <IconEvade /> to activate:
desc.1: A quick dash dodge.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

DashAttackTigerSevenFormsTigerCharge.name: Dash Attack: Tiger Seven Forms - Tiger Charge

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> during a dodge to activate:
desc.1: Perform a quick slash forward, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.

DashAttackTigerSevenFormsMountainKingsGa.name: Dash Attack: Tiger Seven Forms - Mountain King's Game

desc.0: After using <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Tiger Seven Forms - Tiger Charge</ct>, hold <IconNormal /> to activate:
desc.1: Enter a high-speed spinning state. While in this state, use the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to move and deal <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct> upon contact with enemies.
desc.2: After Ju Fufu gains <ct color=#FFFFFF>Momentum</ct> from other skills, she will be surrounded by flames in the high-speed spinning state. Upon contact with enemies, 1 point of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Momentum</ct> is consumed, changing the DMG to <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct> and granting 25 points of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Might</ct>. The maximum for <ct color=#FFFFFF>Momentum</ct> is 15.
desc.3: When consuming <ct color=#FFFFFF>Momentum</ct> to deal <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>, if <ct color=#FFFFFF>Might</ct> is above 100 points, 100 points of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Might</ct> will be automatically consumed to trigger <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack: Suppressing Tiger Cauldron</ct>.
desc.4: Releasing <IconNormal /> will have Ju Fufu exit the spinning state and throw <ct color=#FFFFFF>Hu Wei</ct> to attack enemies, dealing <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>. When switching to another character, Ju Fufu will remain in the spinning state and attempt to collide with the nearest enemy.
desc.5: While Ju Fufu is the currently active character, DMG taken during the skill is reduced by 40%, and Anti-Interrupt Level is increased. If not the active character, she becomes Invulnerable.

DodgeCounterTigerSevenFormsReignitedMoun.name: Dodge Counter: Tiger Seven Forms - Reignited Mountain

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> during a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct> to activate:
desc.1: Perform multiple slashes on enemies ahead, dealing <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

SpecialAttackTigerSevenFormsMountainDesc.name: Special Attack: Tiger Seven Forms - Mountain-Descending Tiger

desc.0: Press <IconSpecial /> to activate:
desc.1: Perform a spinning slash forward, followed by a falling slash, dealing <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

EXSpecialAttackTigerSevenFormsAltMountai.name: EX Special Attack: Tiger Seven Forms Alt - Mountain-Descending Savage Tiger

desc.0: With enough Energy, press <IconSpecialReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Swing <ct color=#FFFFFF>Hu Wei</ct> forward for a powerful strike, dealing massive <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Upon activation, gain 3 points of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Momentum</ct> and 80 points of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Might</ct>.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> is triggered, select the character to activate:
desc.1: Swing Hu Wei to deliver a powerful strike to enemies in a small area ahead, dealing massive <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: With at least 100 points of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Might</ct>, after triggering a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct>, automatically activate:
desc.1: Consume 100 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Might</ct> to open Hu Wei and fire flames and popcorn at enemies, striking them in a small area ahead, dealing massive <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>.
desc.2: If <ct color=#FFFFFF>Momentum</ct> is available, and while not the active character, the high-speed spinning state will activate after the skill ends.
desc.3: This is an <ct color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</ct>. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.1: Perform two downward attacks with Hu Wei, dealing massive <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>.

desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.2: Gain 1 point of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Momentum</ct> upon activation at most once every 10s.

desc.1: The maximum Decibels for all characters in the squad increases by 1,000. When an <ct color=#FFFFFF>Attack</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Rupture</ct> character uses an <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct>, that character gains 300 Decibels.

1.name: Super Scary Little Tiger
1.desc: Upon entering combat, Ju Fufu's CRIT Rate increases by 12%, and she immediately gains 100 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Might</ct>. When Ju Fufu's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> hits an enemy, when the target is Stunned, the target's Stun DMG Multiplier increases by 35%, lasting for 30s.

flavor.0: "The topic of farewells and life and death is too difficult for children to understand, too heavy for adults to bear, and too cruel for the elderly."
flavor.1: "But I'm not afraid — I'm the fearless Tiger Thiren who learned this lesson early."
flavor.2: "I'm a super scary big tiger, little critters, so please don't look directly into my eyes!"

2.name: Almighty Qingming Warrior
2.desc: While in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Tiger's Roar</ct> state, character CRIT DMG increases by an additional 22%. Whenever any character activates an <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct>, Ju Fufu gains 3 points of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Momentum</ct>.

flavor.0: "The techniques Shifu taught me are truly amazing, though it can't compare to those of fairy tales and legend."
flavor.1: "If I were a little stronger — just a little stronger — could I rewrite those fated pasts, like in the stories and legends?
flavor.2: "At first, I was just as puzzled, but once you grasp the trick, it's actually quite simple! Let me teach you, Junior!"

3.name: Righteous Young Hero
3.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: "Good or evil, in that moment, perhaps it's all just a matter of a single thought. A single thought leaves behind so many regrets, so many 'what ifs' — and so much sacrifice and love."
flavor.1: "I'm not smart, I don't understand many of those grand principles, so I just do what I think is right."
flavor.2: "Wherever the great hero Fufu goes, there's justice!"

4.name: Monster-Slaying Tiger Mystic
4.desc: While Ju Fufu is in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Tiger's Roar</ct> state, her CRIT DMG increases by 35%.

flavor.0: "Ethereals are terrifying, bandits are terrifying, Hollow Raiders are terrifying, the dark night without stars is terrifying — and yet, I'm the most powerful mystic of Yunkui Summit. I cannot retreat, I cannot let my story repeat."
flavor.1: "The dark and gloom is a blanketing shroud, unbearable for mountain, moon, and cloud."
flavor.2: "I am the strongest mystic of Yunkui Summit, evil spirits and demons, meet your end!"

5.name: Unrivaled Almighty Senior
5.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: "No need to fear — your senior is here!"
flavor.1: "The hero I longed for when I was a child never came, but I won't make you wait — I will be your hero."
flavor.2: "You can bully me, but not my juniors! I'll take you on! Rwaar!"

6.name: Roar of My Inner Tiger
6.desc: Ju Fufu's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> DMG increases by 30%. Upon consuming <ct color=#FFFFFF>Momentum</ct> and hitting an enemy in the high-speed spinning state, fire 3 popcorns, each dealing 160% of Fufu's ATK as DMG. This DMG is treated as <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> DMG.

flavor.0: "My might shakes the moon down from the mountain, my aura levels caves — how's this line? Does it capture the grandeur of my imposing presence?"
flavor.1: "The name of a hero doesn't matter, their regrets don't matter, their tears don't matter, and even the inevitable farewell doesn't matter."
flavor.2: "As long as you remember, I once roared with bravery."
